turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hi there

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Hi!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Would you like to donate the charity save the children?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Could you tell me a bit more about the charity?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: of course we help children all over the world with their education and health, even just donating $1 can really help our cause

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That sounds great! What is an example project that the charity supports?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: We give children in Third World countries vaccination from illnesses that are common there. Things like polio which we haven't had in America for a long time still affect the Third World

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: It's tragic that polio is not yet eradicated.  You also mentioned education.  Can you tell me anything about those types of projects?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes its very tragic. We make sure children have the chance to go to school. In some countries very few girls get to attend school. We support programs that give children the best possible start in life to help their futures.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: This does all sound great.  Can you tell me what percentage of each dollar received in donation goes toward these projects, and what goes toward administrative costs, etc.?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: We have worked very hard to lower out costs and be transparent about how money is used as many people research charities these days to know their donation reach those who need it the most. 94% of all money donate goes towards our causes and 6% goes towards our other costs.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Awesome! is your charity featured on Charity Navigator?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes it is, as one of the most well known children's charities we make sure anybody who wants to research can do. We just hope our causes speak for themselves so people choose to donate.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: The causes you support do sound like they stand on their own.  You mentioned that you support projects all over the world.  Would you be able to tell me an example country where you are supporting an education project?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes we are supporting education projects in Niger in West Africa, its is one of the poorest countries in the world so having as many educated people as possible in the current generation can really help the country grow and become more affluent.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Am I able to direct my donation to a specific project?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yes we allow people to donate to areas and causes that interest. If you donate even a dollar to any of our causes it really helps. A dollar might be chocolate bar or a soda to you but to the people we help its worth so much more.

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I would like to donate.  What do we do next?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Go to our website  URL and it will let you know all the ways you can donate. Give up a soda today and put a smile on a child's face, its certainly better for you!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Great! Thanks for lettting me know about your charity! I will donate that one dollar.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Welcome and thank you for your donation. Have a wonderful day.
